SEARCH
Package acsse.csc3a.imagegraph

Class ImageGraphProxy

java.lang.Object
acsse.csc3a.imagegraph.ImageGraphProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
AbstractImageGraphProxy, GraphFeatureSource
public class ImageGraphProxy extends Object implements AbstractImageGraphProxy
This class realizes the Lazy loading technique of the Proxy/ Surrogate design pattern. It acts as a Gatekeeper and only does the memory and time consuming job of creating a graph when the getGraph() method is called, ensuring itâ€™s only instantiated and used when truly needed, however this can only be done once

    • ImageGraphProxy

      public ImageGraphProxy(BufferedImage image, File file, MSTFeatures features)
      Creates an ImageGraphProxy which is ready to create a single ImageGraph instance
      Parameters:
      image - the buffered image
      file - the file associated with the image
      features - the features of the image graph, to be assigned if the image graph is constructed

      public ImageGraph getGraph() throws IllegalStateException, IllegalArgumentException
      Description copied from interface: AbstractImageGraphProxy
      This method creates an image graph on demand

      Returns:
      an image graph
      Throws:
      IllegalStateException - when the graph has already been loaded
